graph_title: Domestic material consumption, domestic material consumption per capita, and domestic material consumption per GDP
indicator_name: Domestic material consumption, domestic material consumption per capita, and domestic material consumption per GDP
target_name: Improve progressively, through 2030, global resource efficiency in consumption and production and endeavour to decouple economic growth from environmental degradation, in accordance with the 10‐Y<small>EAR</small> F<small>RAMEWORK OF</small> P<small>ROGRAMMES ON</small> S<small>USTAINABLE</small> C<small>ONSUMPTION AND</small> P<small>RODUCTION</small>, with developed countries taking the lead
